apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc:
Photograph.
The image height and width SHOULD be between thirty-two (32) and ninety-six (96) pixels; the recommended size is sixty-four (64) pixels high and sixty-four (64) pixels wide.
The image SHOULD be square.

apiConstructor.shortdesc: To save a photo, either binaryValue or externalValue are required, but not both.

apiParam.apiDesc: The image type of the photo. Required if binaryValue is passed in.
The BASE64 encoded binary value of the photo. Either binaryValue or externalValue are required, but not both.
The URI to an external photo. Either binaryValue or externalValue are required, but not both.

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc: To save a photo, either binaryValue or externalValue are required, but not both. If binaryValue is passed in, type is required. If externalValue is passed in, type is not required.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc:
Base64 encoded data. The image SHOULD use less than eight kilobytes (8k) of data; this restriction is to be enforced by the publishing client.
The image data MUST conform to the base64Binary datatype [7] and thus be encoded in accordance with Section 6.8 of RFC 2045 [8], which recommends that base64 data should have lines limited to at most 76 characters in length. However, any whitespace characters (e.g., '\\r' and '\\n') MUST be ignored.

apiValue.shortdesc: The URI to an external photo

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The URI to an external photo

apiValue.shortdesc: Mimetype of the given bytes value, if any.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc:
Mimetype of the given bytes value, if any. Should be set by hand.
The image content type [6] SHOULD be image/gif, image/jpeg, or image/png; support for the "image/png" content type is REQUIRED, support for the "image/gif" and "image/jpeg" content types is RECOMMENDED, and support for any other content type is OPTIONAL.

apiConstructor.shortdesc: To save a sound, either phonetic, binaryValue or externalValue are required.

apiParam.apiDesc: The BASE64 encoded binary value of the audio pronunciation.
The URI to an external binary digital audio pronunciation.

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc: To save a sound, either phonetic, binaryValue or externalValue are required.

apiClassifier.shortdesc:
VCard updates in 2010: New vCard data classes to encompass similar properties:
VCardAddress (country, extendedAddress, locality, poBox, postalCode, region, street) VCardGeographicalPosition (latitude, longitude) VCardName (family, given, middle, prefix, suffix) VCardOrganization (name, unit) VCardPhoto (binaryValue, bytes, externalValue, type) VCardSound (binaryValue, bytes, externalValue, phonetic) VCardTelephone (cell, fax, msg, pager, video, voice)
TODO: The only properties not yet implemented from the spec: agent, categories, key

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc:
VCard updates in 2010:
New vCard data classes to encompass similar properties:
VCardAddress (country, extendedAddress, locality, poBox, postalCode, region, street)
VCardGeographicalPosition (latitude, longitude)
VCardName (family, given, middle, prefix, suffix)
VCardOrganization (name, unit)
VCardPhoto (binaryValue, bytes, externalValue, type)
VCardSound (binaryValue, bytes, externalValue, phonetic)
VCardTelephone (cell, fax, msg, pager, video, voice)
TODO: The only properties not yet implemented from the spec: agent, categories, key

adobeApiEvent.shortdesc: Dispatched when saving the vCard fails.

adobeApiEventDetail.apiDesc: Dispatched when saving the vCard fails.

adobeApiEvent.shortdesc: Dispatched when the vCard has been saved.

adobeApiEventDetail.apiDesc: Dispatched when the vCard has been saved.

adobeApiEvent.shortdesc: Dispatched when the vCard has loaded.

adobeApiEventDetail.apiDesc: Dispatched when the vCard has loaded.

apiConstructor.shortdesc: Don't call directly, use the static method getVCard() and add a callback.

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc: Don't call directly, use the static method getVCard() and add a callback.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Create the XML needed to send the VCard within the Extension.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Create the XML needed to send the VCard within the Extension.

apiOperation.shortdesc: The way a vCard is requested and then later referred to.

apiReturn.apiDesc: Reference to the vCard which will be filled once the loaded event occurs.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Deserializes the incoming IQ to fill the values of this vCard.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Deserializes the incoming IQ to fill the values of this vCard.

apiValue.shortdesc: The interval on which to flush the vCard cache.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The interval on which to flush the vCard cache. The default value is 6 hours.

apiValue.shortdesc: Map of the vCard's private extensions.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Map of the vCard's private extensions.

apiValue.shortdesc: Indicates whether the vCard has been loaded.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Indicates whether the vCard has been loaded.

apiValue.shortdesc: Identifier of product that generated the vCard.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Identifier of product that generated the vCard.

apiValue.shortdesc: Time zone's Standard Time UTC offset.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Time zone's Standard Time UTC offset.
Version of the vCard. Usually 2.0 or 3.0.
